ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds beef tenderloin, at room temperature

cookingTips: Bring beef to room temperature for 30 minutes before cooking for even doneness
Use a meat thermometer to achieve precise doneness: 125°F for rare, 135°F for medium-rare
Let the cooked tenderloin rest for 10 minutes before slicing to retain juices
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show me how to prepare a premium beef tenderloin for air frying, monitor temperature accurately, and rest it properly for maximum tenderness and flavor.
